comments:

AbstractSourceContainer.isFindDuplicates does not check for this.

I browsed the hierarchy and this seems to be a limited problem.
From what I could see only AbstractSourceContainer was not handling a null director.

Change released to AbstractSourceContainer.
Please verify.
